column3: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.

Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.

I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back.
Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
Peace begins with a smile.
Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.

I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.
Colors are the smiles of nature.
Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.

I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
Smile, it's free therapy.

While you're going through this process of trying to find the satisfaction in your work, pretend you feel satisfied. Tell yourself you had a good day. Walk through the corridors with a smile rather than a scowl. Your positive energy will radiate. If you act like you're having fun, you'll find you are having fun.
